Name: Ramnaresh
Title: Feed The Soul Visit Hare Krishna Golden Temple
Review: Best temple to find the real self and purpose of life, More than 50 full time devotees are serving ≈örƒ´la PrabhupƒÅda's mission of spreading Krishna Consciousness through the Hare Krishna Movement. Blessed to be here. Advice you to must visit this place. For kids cultural camps are conducted here for college students and for working professionals FOLK, Youth Empowerment Club is here and similarly spiritual retreats and programs for the people from all walks of life you will find here. Dham Yatras ( Spiritual Tours ) are also organised by Hare Krishna Golden Temple throughout the year.Overall It's a must visit place

Name: naveen
Title: misleading cheaters
Review: These are cheaters, they are not real followers of ISKCON,  They simply use the name of Hare Krishna, but they are deviants from original ISKCON founded by Srila Prabhupada. they simply use the reputation of original ISKCON  and collect funds, they dont represent  ISKCON .  they are not bonafide gaudiya vaishnavas,

Name: Kuldeep
Title: Hare Krishna Golden Temple Best peaceful place to visit
Review: The temple campus is very well maintained and spacious with a beautiful park having kadamb trees around. Within campus there is also a very big Sankirtana Hall where special events are held to manage big crows gathering on special days like Janmastami, Ramanavami, Nityananda Triyodashi etc. The temples devotee who are living dedicates life are very courteous and lively and it's easy to interact with them if you need any help or information. The temple is Telangana's first Golden Temple. It is also Swayambhu Laxmi Narsimha Swamy kshetram. Lord Narsimha with godess laxmi manifested on its own and stands together in abhaya mudra. Panchajanya Mahadev also self manifested here. Each Sunday in the evening there is big aarati of Gauranga, Narsimh and Tulsi Maharani and then Sankirtana happens. You will see people dancing and jumping out of ecstasy during the Sankirtana.You can buy and get chanting beads, bead bags, Lords nicely framed pictures. Also there are lots of scripture books that you can get (by His Divine Grace AC Bhaktivedanta Swamy Srila Prabhupada) including Bhagavad Gita as it is, Srimad Bhagvatam, Science of self Realisation, Perfect question Perfect Answer, Journey of Self Discovery to name a few. Also painting, story and and activity books are available for children about depicting lilas and features of the Lord. Surely visit once you get life changing experience with your family and dear ones. Hare Krishna!

Name: HkM Golden Temple
Title: Golden Temple
Review: Located off Road-12 in Banjara Hills, it is one of the newer temples in Hyderabad. Well maintained it has a nice peaceful ambiance. The central courtyard is airy and spacious and you can watch the puja and listen to bhajans sitting here. The temple opens between 6 am-12 noon in morning and then from 5 in evening till 10 pm.

Name: HkM Golden Temple
Review: It's unbelievable to imagine a very ancient temples in urban centers filled with honking sounds and harmful pollution...But its dream come true that a wondrous and magnificent temple where gorgeous and  grand Sri Swayambhu Sri Laxmi Narasimha Swamy along with Swayambhu Panchajanyeswara(Siva) are staying here in Archa Avatar in Self manifested forms.Both the dieties are extra special in unusual way when noticed will give you a captivating and spellbound heavenly experience,its noteworthy these forms of dieties cannot be found else where in the entire universe(Observe it yourself-Laxmi Devi on right of Narasimha and Peculiar conchshell Swayambhu Siva linga).In addition to it you can also have a darsan of  unique Chaturmuka Hanuman ji holding a Chanting mala,Garuda Dev,Sublime and lovely Sri sri Radha Govinda along with Nitiai Gauranga.The Hari Nama Sankirtana which is only way to go back to godhead will leave you a best feeling is quite unexplanatory in a good way. The terrific water falls beside the main temple hall will give you the tranquil and soothing experience.The open garden in the hill top is very peaceful and incredible.I heard from great grand older generations that temple is a place of education,but never experienced until i visited this temple.Specifically in this temple You can learn about the secret key for a happy and peaceful life based on the principles of Timeless Vedic wisdom,Expert guides from Hare Krishna Movement ,Hyderabad-FOLK department,are sure to give you answers to all your questions and even much more.It will change the paradigm of your life!MUST ATTEND FOR ALL YOUTH OF OUR NATION....... Finally bringing transformation in the society through temple centered welfare activities is really commendable and its the true meaning of TEMPLE ..For a divine and self-exploring journey then take time out and visit this temple for a phenomenal experienceVisit with family  or friends for a really blessed and extraordinary experience and feel great while walking out of this place.Its sensational to have a sublime spiritual experience...
